page.title: 20RELIGION
page.content: THERE IS NO CHURCH IN THE GRID AREA OF SPRATTON BUT PEOPLE WHO LIVE THERE ATTEND THE ANGLICAN CHURCH IN THE VILLAGE OR GO INTO KINGSTHORPE IF THEY ARE NONCONFORMISTS. ROMAN CATHOLICS IN THE AREA ATTEND EITHER THE CATHEDRAL IN NORTHAMPTON OR THE CHURCH IN DUSTON. HOLDENBY HAS A CHURCH BUT HAS NO INCUMBENT ONLY OCCASIONAL SERVICES ARE HELD THERE SUCH AS CHRISTMAS AND HARVEST FESTIVAL. THE ROOF HAS RECENTLY BEEN RESTORED AND PAID FOR BY THE REDUNDANT CHURCHES FUND. ATTENDANCE AT CHURCHES IS LOW BUT IN PROPORTION TO THE POPULATION IS MUCH HIGHER THAN IN TOWNS. THE CHRISTIAN ETHIC IS NEVERTHELESS PRACTISED AS IS EVIDENT IN CARE FOR THE ELDERLY AND PEOPLE IN DIFFICULTIES.
